mapper.sql: id, user_id, user_name, login_time, logout_time, session_id
mapper.insert:
insert into t_user_record
id,
user_id,
user_name,
login_time,
logout_time,
session_id,

mapper.update:
update t_user_record
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_time = #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
logout_time = #{logoutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
session_id = #{sessionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_user_record set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_time = #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, logout_time = #{logoutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, session_id = #{sessionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from t_user_record where 1=1 and login_time >= str_to_date(#{curTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') and logout_time >= str_to_date(#{curTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') and login_time like CONCAT('%', substring(#{curTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},0,8))
